quote: But now here I am: No money. No place to stay. It should be my worst nightmare. But I don't care. It's funny the things you think you're scared of until they're upon you, and then you're not.
quote_letters: BUT NOW HERE I AM NO MONEY NO PLACE TO STAY IT SHOULD BE MY WORST NIGHTMARE BUT I DONT CARE ITS FUNNY THE THINGS YOU THINK YOURE SCARED OF UNTIL THEYRE UPON YOU AND THEN YOURE NOT
